template<class Expr , int N>
int ltl::kappa_average_median (const ExprBase< Expr, N > &e, const double kappa, const typename Expr::value_type nan, double *const mean, double *const sigma=NULL)
 

Detailed Description

Clip according to average, but store median of remaining to mean. Return number of elements after clipping (and optionally resulting sigma in pointed address. Optionally neglect values == nan.
